pullrequest.title: Unicode strings and other Python 3 forward-compatible changes.

content.raw:
lol, ok so we know who to blame! xD

But that it's definitely a nice feature to just have to use one index. 

Now we should hope that this is fixed in pandas soon, so that this pull request can be merged. I'll be away from bitbucket for a few days and will not be able to test stuff. But I think this should be the last thing that produces bugs.
content.html:
lol, ok so we know who to blame! xD

But that it's definitely a nice feature to just have to use one index.

Now we should hope that this is fixed in pandas soon, so that this pull request can be merged. I'll be away from bitbucket for a few days and will not be able to test stuff. But I think this should be the last thing that produces bugs.
